title: Enthralling Ruby & Diamond Floral Navratna Haaram
materials: Vivid Red). Hyderabadi Polish finish for lasting luster.
features: A modern take on the classic Navratna Haaram. Features a delicate gold mesh chain leading to a stunning centerpiece of floral-shaped diamond clusters, each surrounding a vibrant, cabochon-cut ruby. The design incorporates open-work settings to maximize diamond brilliance. The floral motifs are interspersed with delicate leaf designs crafted with meticulous detail.
occasions: and upscale social gatherings. A striking piece for the modern bride or for any woman seeking a touch of elegance and sophistication.
description: This modern Haaram is a unique blend of tradition and contemporary design. The vibrant rubies and sparkling diamonds create a captivating contrast, while the gold mesh chain adds a touch of modern sophistication. The Hyderabadi polish ensures a lasting brilliance that will be cherished for years to come. A statement piece that embodies both timeless beauty and modern flair.
